column4: I have the standard Open Office installation - which is my preferred office product - and then I installed Lotus Symphony. Since that my text files (odt) open automatically with Symphony.
How can I switch back so that Open Office starts the odt files as a standard?
right click on any .odt file. Properties->Open with change to OpenOffice.org Word Processor. Should make all .odt files open automatically with Open Office
Thank you! (Works perfectly ... and it was so easy ...)
